mapper.update: update stores set `name` = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, manager_id = #{managerId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, description = #{description,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=DATE}, address = #{address,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, email = #{email,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: select id, `name`, manager_id, description, create_time, address, email from stores
